title: Understanding Discrimination
text: Discrimination involves treating people unfairly based on certain characteristics. Think about what actions might be considered discriminatory.

hintAnswer: discrimination consists of actions against a group of people. Discrimination can be based on race, ethnicity, age, religion, health, sexual orientation, gender identity, or disability
title: Identifying Discriminatory Actions
text: Consider actions that target specific groups based on characteristics like race, gender, or age. What do these actions have in common?
choices: Discrimination is a feeling of dislike towards a group
Discrimination consists of actions against a group of people
Discrimination is a law that protects certain groups
Discrimination is a type of communication between groups
